column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////This is BY FAR the best steakhouse in Chicago. I would definitely suggest making reservation because they are slammed on the weekends. I love the atmosphere here
column2: it's a nice romantic candle lit dinner. The staff has been amazing all times I've been here and the drinks are very consistent. Now onto the steak - when I say this is the best steak house in Chicago
column3: I am not fooling you. I usually get the dry aged rib eye. Amazing. If you're not much of a steak person
column4: I would highly recommend the fried chicken. Even if you are a steak person- try the fried chicken. Seriously.
